name: Dungeon Rush (itch)
description:
A basic auto-run game with a Dungeon theme. The player is rushing through a castle full of foes to defeat the boss at the end. Mechanics include fighting enemies by playing a "Rock, paper, scissor" type guessing game with a little twist. Players have health and mana which can be restored via potions.

Uses the "U, I, O, J, K, L, and 3" keys since this was designed for an arcade machine
